snippet.title: ARKOS Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1596440/ARKOS/

Arkos is a first-person fantasy shooter with unique voxel render. 
Arkos inspired by the classic old first person shooters of the 90s like Heretic, Hexen and Catacomb3D, but rendered in one TRUE voxel volume.
